config.farlands.title: FarLands configuration
config.farlands.killEntities: Kill falling block entities in the Far Lands
config.farlands.farLandsEnabled.tooltip: Whether or not the Far Lands should generate.
config.farlands.killEntities.tooltip: Whether or not falling block entities (e.g. sand, gravel...) should be killed when spawned in the Far Lands.
config.farlands.category.world.warning: These options are global! They will affect any chunks generated with this mod enabled, you have been warned!
config.farlands.category.fixes.subcatego: These options are experimental! They could break your world or cause any given set of problems, you have been warned!
config.farlands.fixLighting.tooltip.desc: Fixes lighting issues up to X/Z: ±2^26 / ±67108864.
config.farlands.fixLighting.tooltip.warn: It is not recommended to enable this option on a server, nor load an existing world with it enabled.
config.farlands.fixLighting.tooltip.rest: Restart your game after applying this fix, otherwise the server may eventually crash.
config.farlands.fixParticlesEntities.too: Fixes precision loss with various entities and particles.
This fixes precision loss with the following particles:
This fixes precision loss with the following entities:
Enchanting Table book (partially, as its angle isn't fixed)
config.farlands.fixOreGeneration.tooltip: Fixes precision loss with ore generation, which was causing ores to be always 2^n blocks apart from each other.
config.farlands.fixMobSpawning.tooltip: Fixes precision loss with mob spawning.
config.farlands.coordinateScaleMultiplie: The coordinate scale multiplier (coordinate scale * multiplier).
config.farlands.heightScaleMultiplier.to: The height scale multiplier (height scale * multiplier).
